TEXT.English: Dynamic Religion is a module using the system of Dynamic traits to change how religions are founded.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Instead of being founded by researching technologies, Religions in this module are founded depending on the various civilizations' actions. Taking control of more forests will get you closer to the Fellowship of Leaves for example.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]A full list of the actions granting points towards the religion of your choice is available in the dynamic trait menu in the top left of the screen while in game.
TEXT.French: Dynamic Religion is a module using the system of Dynamic traits to change how religions are founded.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Instead of being founded by researching technologies, Religions in this module are founded depending on the various civilizations' actions. Taking control of more forests will get you closer to the Fellowship of Leaves for example.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]A full list of the actions granting points towards the religion of your choice is available in the dynamic trait menu in the top left of the screen while in game.

Taking control of more forests will get you closer to the Fellowship of Leaves for example.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]A full list of the actions granting points towards the religion of your choice is available in the dynamic trait menu in the top left of the screen while in game.

Taking control of more forests will get you closer to the Fellowship of Leaves for example.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]A full list of the actions granting points towards the religion of your choice is available in the dynamic trait menu in the top left of the screen while in game.

Taking control of more forests will get you closer to the Fellowship of Leaves for example.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]A full list of the actions granting points towards the religion of your choice is available in the dynamic trait menu in the top left of the screen while in game.
